text: <prosody rate="-30%" pitch="-10%"><phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="ɖʱɑː t̪ʊ jɑː">dhātuyā</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="ce t̪ə nɑː">cetanā</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="pə t̪ɪʈ ʈhɪ t̪ɑː">patiṭṭhitā</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="pət̪ t̪ʰə nɑː">patthanā</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/></prosody>
